statements: SELECT * FROM player_contracts;
SELECT player_id, contract_start, salary FROM player_contracts WHERE salary > 500000;
SELECT player_id, contract_end FROM player_contracts WHERE contract_start >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM player_contracts ORDER BY salary DESC, player_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(salary) AS avg_salary FROM player_contracts;
SELECT * FROM player_contracts WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, contract_start, salary FROM player_contracts WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT player_id, contract_start, contract_end FROM player_contracts WHERE contract_start BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM player_contracts WHERE contract_end < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT player_id, SUM(salary) AS total_salary FROM player_contracts GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_salary > 100000;
SELECT * FROM PlayerContracts;
SELECT player_id, contract_value FROM PlayerContracts WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, signing_date, expiration_date FROM PlayerContracts ORDER BY signing_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, contract_value, signing_date, expiration_date FROM PlayerContracts WHERE contract_value > 1000000;
SELECT from_team, to_team, trade_date FROM TradeHistory ORDER BY trade_date;
SELECT * FROM PlayerContracts WHERE contract_value > 100000 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC
SELECT player_id, signing_date FROM PlayerContracts WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY signing_date
SELECT player_id, from_team, to_team, trade_date FROM TradeHistory WHERE trade_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY trade_date DESC
SELECT player_id, contract_value FROM PlayerContracts WHERE signing_date < '2020-01-01' AND contract_value BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000 ORDER BY contract_value
SELECT trade_id, from_team FROM TradeHistory WHERE to_team = 'Lakers' ORDER BY trade_date ASC
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, team_id FROM contracts WHERE team_id = 10;
SELECT end_date, start_date FROM contracts WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT player_id, team_id, start_date FROM contracts WHERE player_id = 5 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM salaries WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, team_id, start_date FROM contracts WHERE team_id = 5 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, salary_amount, year FROM salaries WHERE salary_amount > 50000 AND year >= 2020;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, from_team_id, to_team_id FROM trade_history WHERE trade_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT player_id, team_id, start_date, end_date FROM contracts WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PlayerContracts;
SELECT player_id, salary FROM SalaryInformation WHERE bonus > 1000;
SELECT team_id, team_name FROM Teams ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT player_id, contract_end_date FROM PlayerContracts WHERE player_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM TradeHistory WHERE trade_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PlayerContracts WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY contract_end_date DESC
SELECT player_id, team_id FROM PlayerContracts JOIN SalaryInformation ON PlayerContracts.player_id = SalaryInformation.player_id WHERE SalaryInformation.bonus > 1000
SELECT trade_id, from_team_id, to_team_id FROM TradeHistory WHERE trade_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY trade_date ASC
SELECT team_id, team_name FROM Teams WHERE team_name LIKE '%City%'
SELECT PlayerContracts.player_id, Team.team_name, PlayerContracts.salary FROM PlayerContracts JOIN Teams AS Team ON PlayerContracts.team_id = Team.team_id WHERE PlayerContracts.salary < 75000
SELECT * FROM Players WHERE position = 'Forward';
SELECT player_name, salary FROM Players WHERE salary > 1000000;
SELECT team_name, city, state FROM Teams WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT player_name, position FROM Players WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT player_id, salary FROM SalaryHistory WHERE effective_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, position, salary FROM Players WHERE position='Forward'
SELECT team_name, city, state, COUNT(player_id) AS total_players FROM Teams JOIN Players ON Teams.team_id = Players.team_id GROUP BY team_name, city, state
SELECT player_name, position, team_name, city, state FROM Players JOIN Teams ON Players.team_id = Teams.team_id
SELECT player_name, start_date, end_date FROM Players JOIN Contracts ON Players.player_id = Contracts.player_id
SELECT DISTINCT team_name, city, state FROM Teams
